content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: smoker
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_spruce_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "fox_spawn_egg", "quantity": 39, "index": 21}, {"type": "trapped_chest", "quantity": 45, "index": 23}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 3, "index": 26}, {"type": "magenta_stained_glass", "quantity": 29, "index": 28}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "brown_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 5, "index": 43}]

thought: To craft a smoker, I first need to craft a furnace. To craft a furnace, I need to place 8 cobblestones in a square formation in the crafting table. Therefore I will first move one of the cobblestones to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 43 to slot 1 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "fox_spawn_egg", "quantity": 39, "index": 21}, {"type": "trapped_chest", "quantity": 45, "index": 23}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 3, "index": 26}, {"type": "magenta_stained_glass", "quantity": 29, "index": 28}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "brown_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 4, "index": 43}]
thought: Next I will move another cobblestone to slot 2, which is directly to the right of slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 43 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: smoker
inventory=[{"type": "furnace", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 6}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 7}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 8}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 9}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "fox_spawn_egg", "quantity": 39, "index": 21}, {"type": "trapped_chest", "quantity": 45, "index": 23}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "magenta_stained_glass", "quantity": 29, "index": 28}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "brown_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}]

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1

thought: To craft a smoker, I need to place a furnace in the middle, surrounded by any log on the left, top, and right. The stripped acacia wood in slot 35 is a log, so I will move it to slot 2 (the top).
Ok
act: move from slot 35 to slot 2 with quantity 1
